data: `minecraft:fog` is a Volume Component that is defined by two parameters. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: fog_identifier
data.Description: The identifier of a fog definition. Note that you will not receive any feedback if the definition does not exist.

data.Name: priority
data.Description: The priority for this fog definition setting. Smaller numbers have higher priority. Fogs with equal priority will be combined together.

data: `minecraft:fog` does not use any extra parameters.
